text:
- [Narrator] AWS Data
Exchange makes it easy

to harness data at scale,
with a wide variety

of third party travel and
hospitality data products.

Gain insights into your
customers' purchasing patterns,

behaviors, and engagements with
the latest and most accurate
travel and hospitality data sets.
With AWS Data Exchange,

you can identify customer
intent for travel plans,

forecast shifts in
regional and global demand,
and improve your marketing strategies
and sponsorship opportunities.

Combine third party data
from AWS Data Exchange

with your enterprise data to
gain a 360-degree customer view

and identify areas of
growth for your business.
From Foursquare's global Places data,
to PredictHQ's demand intelligence API,

find hundreds of data
products that you can analyze
with a wide variety of AWS analytics
and machine learning services.

Numerous data providers
offer flexible trials

so you can evaluate the
data before you buy.
Learn more and get started today.
